TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Contract extends System.Object
public ref class Contract abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用于表示程序协定（如前置条件、后置条件和对象固定）的静态方法。

span.span: Contains static methods for representing program contracts such as preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码协定类使你可以在代码中指定前置条件、后置条件和对象固定。Code contract classes let you specify preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants in your code. 前置条件是输入方法或属性时必须满足的要求。Preconditions are requirements that must be met when entering a method or property. 后置条件描述在方法或属性代码退出时的预期。Postconditions describe expectations at the time the method or property code exits. 对象固定条件描述了不存在任何条件问题的类的预期状态。Object invariants describe the expected state for a class that has no condition problems. 有关前置条件、后置条件和对象固定条件的详细信息，请参阅[代码协定](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/code-contracts.md)。For more information about preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants, see [Code Contracts](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/code-contracts.md). 有关使用代码协定的工具和详细说明，请参阅 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)。For tools and detailed instructions for using code contracts, see [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace. > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须使用二进制重写程序插入协定的运行时强制。You must use a binary rewriter to insert run-time enforcement of contracts. 否则，只有在违反协定的情况下，才可以静态测试 方法等协定并且不会在运行时引发异常。Otherwise, contracts such as the method can only be tested statically and will not throw exceptions during run time if a contract is violated. 可以从 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)下载二进制重写 CCRewrite。You can download the binary rewriter CCRewrite from [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace. CCRewrite 附带了一个 Visual Studio 外接程序，使你能够从项目**属性**页激活运行时协定强制。CCRewrite comes with a Visual Studio add-in that enables you to activate run-time contract enforcement from the project **Properties** page. 二进制重写程序和 Visual Studio 外接程序不附带 [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 Windows SDK。The binary rewriter and the Visual Studio add-in do not ship with [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] or the Windows SDK.

summary.span: 在调试版本中，针对指定条件执行运行时测试。

span.span: In debug builds, performs a run-time test for a specified condition.

Public Shared Sub Assert (condition As Boolean)

static member Assert : bool -> unit

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

summary.span: 检查条件；如果条件为 ，则遵循为分析器设置的升级策略。

span.span: Checks for a condition; if the condition is , follows the escalation policy set for the analyzer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认升级策略是通知附加调试器有关协定失败的情况，或者如果未附加调试器，则显示 "**断言**" 对话框。The default escalation policy is to notify the attached debugger about a contract failure or to display an **Assert** dialog box if a debugger is not attached. 或者，可以指示分析器引发异常。Optionally, the analyzer can be instructed to throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Assert (bool condition, string userMessage);
.method public static hidebysig void Assert(bool condition, string userMessage) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Assert (condition As Boolean, userMessage As String)
public: static void Assert(bool condition, System::String ^ userMessage);
static member Assert : bool * string -> unit

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

param.name: userMessage
param.span: 在不满足条件时要显示的消息。

span.span: A message to display if the condition is not met.

summary.span: 检查条件；如果条件为 ，则遵循由分析器设置的升级策略，并显示指定的消息。

span.span: Checks for a condition; if the condition is , follows the escalation policy set by the analyzer and displays the specified message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认升级策略是通知附加调试器有关协定失败的情况，或者如果未附加调试器，则显示 "**断言**" 对话框。The default escalation policy is to notify the attached debugger about a contract failure or to display an **Assert** dialog box if a debugger is not attached. 或者，可以指示分析器引发异常。Optionally, the analyzer can be instructed to throw an exception. `userMessage` 参数将传递给调试器输出。The `userMessage` parameter is passed to the debugger output. 如果 `userMessage` 不是常量字符串，则工具可能无法读取它。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, tools may not be able to read it.

summary.span: 指示代码分析工具假设某个条件为 （即使无法静态地证明该条件始终为 ）。

span.span: Instructs code analysis tools to assume that a condition is , even if it cannot be statically proven to always be .

span.span: Instructs code analysis tools to assume that the specified condition is , even if it cannot be statically proven to always be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，使用此方法等效于使用 方法。At run time, using this method is equivalent to using the method.

span.span: Instructs code analysis tools to assume that a condition is , even if it cannot be statically proven to always be , and displays a message if the assumption fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `userMessage` 不是常量字符串，则工具可能无法理解该协定。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools. 在运行时，使用此方法等效于使用 方法。At run time, using this method is equivalent to using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static event EventHandler<System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs> ContractFailed;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs> ContractFailed
Public Shared Custom Event ContractFailed As EventHandler(Of ContractFailedEventArgs)
public: static event EventHandler<System::Diagnostics::Contracts::ContractFailedEventArgs ^> ^ ContractFailed;
member this.ContractFailed : EventHandler<System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs>

summary.span: 协定失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a contract fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的事件信息由传递给事件处理程序的 对象提供。The event information for this event is supplied by the object that is passed to the event handler. 此事件通知托管应用程序环境，如交互式解释器或 Web 浏览器宿主，协定已失败。This event notifies a managed application environment such as an interactive interpreter or a Web browser host that a contract has failed. 在执行此操作之前，它将引发一个事件，应用程序可以根据需要处理该事件。Before doing so, it will raise an event that an application can handle as it sees fit. 例如，如果代码在测试框架中运行，则可以记录测试失败，然后结束测试。For example, if code is being run in a testing framework, you can log a test failure and then end the test. .NET Framework 类库中 方法的默认实现是调用注册到 事件的每个处理程序。The default implementation of the method in the .NET Framework class library is to call each handler that is registered with the event. 处理程序引发的异常将被忽略，但每个处理程序都可以通过调用事件自变量的 方法，指示是否处理了该失败。Exceptions thrown by handlers are ignored, but each handler can indicate whether the failure is handled by calling the method for the event arguments. 如果任何处理程序将失败设置为 "已处理"，则该方法将返回 `null`，而不执行进一步的操作。If any handler sets the failure as handled, the method returns `null` and no further action is taken. 或者，处理程序可以调用 方法来指示代码展开。Alternatively, handlers can call the method to instruct the code to unwind. 在这种情况下，在执行所有处理程序后，将引发异常。In that case, an exception is thrown after all handlers have executed.

summary.span: 当方法的协定仅包含 -- 形式的前置条件时，标记协定部分的结尾。

span.span: Marks the end of the contract section when a method's contracts contain only preconditions in the -- form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数代码已包含 `if`-`then`-`throw` 代码格式的参数验证。Most code already contains some parameter validation in the form of `if`-`then`-`throw` code. 协定工具识别 `if`-在语句中的第一条语句首次出现时，`then`-`throw` 语句作为前提条件，并且整个此类语句后跟显式 方法调用，如 、、或 。The contract tools recognize `if`-`then`-`throw` statements as preconditions when the statements appear first inside a method, and the entire set of such statements is followed by an explicit method call, such as a , , , or . 如果 `if`-`then`-此窗体中显示 `throw` 语句，协定工具会将其识别为旧的必需语句。When `if`-`then`-`throw` statements appear in this form, the contract tools recognize them as legacy-require statements. 仅当没有其他 `if`协定 -`then`-`throw` 序列时，才使用 窗体，但它们仍应标记为 "旧-需要"。The form is used only if no other contracts follow the `if`-`then`-`throw` sequences, but they should still be tagged as legacy-requires.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition` 参数指定当封闭方法或属性正常返回时应 `true` 的后置条件。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property returns normally. - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 必须使用二进制重写程序（在 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)中提供），才能执行此后置条件。You must use the binary rewriter (available at [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace) for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法确保返回预期值。The following example shows how to use the method to ensure that an expected value is returned. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ContractExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ContractExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/vb/program.vb#3)]

param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

param.span: 表达式不为 时要显示的消息。

span.span: The message to display if the expression is not .

summary.span: 为提供的退出条件指定后置条件协定，并指定条件为 时要显示的消息。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for a provided exit condition and a message to display if the condition is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition` 参数指定当封闭方法或属性正常返回时应 `true` 的后置条件。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property returns normally. - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序（在 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)中提供），才能执行此后置条件。You must use the binary rewriter (available at [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace) for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. - 如果 `userMessage` 不是常量字符串，则工具可能无法理解该协定。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools.

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property based on the provided exception and condition.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnsuresOnThrow<TException> (bool condition) where TException : Exception;

Public Shared Sub EnsuresOnThrow(Of TException As Exception) (condition As Boolean)
static member EnsuresOnThrow : bool -> unit (requires 'Exception :> Exception)

typeparam.name: TException
typeparam.span: 引发后置条件检查的异常的类型。

span.span: The type of exception that invokes the postcondition check.

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property, based on the provided exception and condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition` 参数指定一个后置条件，当封闭方法或属性异常终止，并引发类型 `TException` 的异常时，应 `true` 此后置条件。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property terminates abnormally and an exception of type `TException` is thrown. - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序来执行此后置条件的运行时强制。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this postcondition.

param.span: 表达式为 时要显示的消息。

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定后置条件协定，并指定条件为 时要显示的消息。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract and a message to display if the condition is for the enclosing method or property, based on the provided exception and condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition` 参数指定一个后置条件，当封闭方法或属性异常终止，并引发类型 `TException` 的异常时，应 `true` 此后置条件。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property terminates abnormally and an exception of type `TException` is thrown. `message` 参数指定在 `false`条件时要显示的消息。The `message` parameter specifies a message to display if the condition is `false`. - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序来执行此后置条件的运行时强制。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. - 如果 `userMessage` 不是常量字符串，则工具可能无法理解该协定。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `toExclusive` 参数比最后一个整数要方便地使用从0开始的整数范围的长度。The `toExclusive` parameter is one more than the last integer to facilitate using the length of a range of integers starting at 0. 例如，对于整数0到4，它将设置为5。For example, it would be set to 5 for integers 0 through 4.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Invariant (bool condition);
.method public static hidebysig void Invariant(bool condition) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Invariant (condition As Boolean)
public: static void Invariant(bool condition);
static member Invariant : bool -> unit

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个固定的协定。

span.span: Specifies an invariant contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定包含在 属性标识的方法中;通常，方法名为 `ObjectInvariant`。 contracts are contained within a method that is identified by the attribute; typically, the method is named `ObjectInvariant`. - 只能在类上声明的专用固定方法中指定该协定。This contract can be specified only in a dedicated invariant method that is declared on a class. 如果该方法不是密封的，则它应只引用受保护的成员而不是私有成员，这样子类就可以确保保持固定不变。If the method is not sealed, it should refer only to protected members, not private members, so that subclasses can be sure to maintain the invariants. - 此协定未向客户端公开;因此，它可能引用与封闭方法不可见的成员。This contract is not exposed to clients; therefore, it may reference members that are less visible than the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序来执行此固定的运行时强制。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this invariant. - 固定条件根据 `CONTRACTS FULL` 符号的存在有条件地定义。Invariants are conditionally defined based on the presence of the `CONTRACTS FULL` symbol. 在运行时检查期间，每次公共方法结束都要检查固定协定。During run-time checking, invariants are checked at the end of each public method. 如果某个固定条件提到同一个类中的公共方法，则在该公共方法结束时通常会发生的固定检查将被禁用，并且仅在对该类的最外面的方法调用结束时检查。If an invariant mentions a public method in the same class, the invariant check that would normally happen at the end of that public method is disabled and checked only at the end of the outermost method call to that class. 如果因调用其他类上的方法而重新输入类，也会发生此类情况。This also happens if the class is re-entered because of a call to a method on another class.

span.span: Specifies an invariant contract for the enclosing method or property, and displays a message if the condition for the contract fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定包含在 属性标识的方法中;通常，方法名为 `ObjectInvariant`。 contracts are contained within a method that is identified by the attribute; typically, the method is named `ObjectInvariant`. - 只能在类上声明的专用固定方法中指定该协定。This contract can be specified only in a dedicated invariant method that is declared on a class. - 此协定未向客户端公开;因此，它可能引用与封闭方法不可见的成员。This contract is not exposed to clients; therefore, it may reference members that are less visible than the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序来执行此固定的运行时强制。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this invariant. - 固定条件在 `CONTRACTS FULL` 符号上有条件地定义。Invariants are conditionally defined on the `CONTRACTS FULL` symbol. 在运行时检查期间，每次公共方法结束都要检查固定协定。During run-time checking, invariants are checked at the end of each public method. 如果某个固定条件提到同一个类中的公共方法，则在该公共方法结束时通常会发生的固定检查将被禁用，并且仅在对该类的最外面的方法调用结束时检查。If an invariant mentions a public method in the same class, the invariant check that would normally happen at the end of that public method is disabled and checked only at the end of the outermost method call to that class. 如果因调用其他类上的方法而重新输入类，也会发生此类情况。This also happens if the class is re-entered because of a call to a method on another class.

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个前置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a precondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 当向后兼容性不强制引发特定异常时，请使用此方法而不是 方法。Use this method instead of the method when backward compatibility does not force you to throw a particular exception.

span.span: Specifies a precondition contract for the enclosing method or property, and throws an exception if the condition for the contract fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须打开运行时检查才能使用 方法。You must turn on run-time checking to use the method. 如果运行时检查处于关闭状态，则进程将被终止。If run-time checking is turned off, the process will be terminated. 若要获取运行时检查的工具，请参阅 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)。To obtain the tools for runtime checking, see [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace. - 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 如果要在前置条件失败时引发异常，请使用此方法而不是 方法。Use this method instead of the method when you want to throw an exception if the precondition fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须打开运行时检查才能使用 方法。You must turn on run-time checking to use the method. 如果运行时检查处于关闭状态，则进程将被终止。If run-time checking is turned off, the process will be terminated. 若要获取运行时检查的工具，请参阅 Visual Studio Marketplace 上的[代码协定](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET)。To obtain the tools for runtime checking, see [Code Contracts](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=RiSEResearchinSoftwareEngineering.CodeContractsforNET) on the Visual Studio Marketplace. 此方法调用必须位于方法或属性的开头，位于任何其他代码之前。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此合同向客户端公开;因此，它必须只引用至少与封闭方法相同的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 如果要在前置条件失败时引发异常，请使用此方法而不是 方法。Use this method instead of the method when you want to throw an exception if the precondition fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只能在 协定的条件表达式中使用。This method can be used only in the conditional expression for the contract. 与 方法一样，每次编译器能推断出类型时都可发出泛型类型参数。As with the method, you can omit the generic type parameter whenever the compiler is able to infer its type. 协定重写程序将方法调用替换为 `out` 参数的值。The contract rewriter replaces the method call with the value of the `out` parameter. 方法仅可在后置条件中出现。The method may appear only in postconditions. 方法的自变量必须为 `out` 参数或结构 `out` 参数的字段。The argument to the method must be an `out` parameter or a field of a structure `out` parameter. 在引用结构构造函数后置条件中的字段时，后者也非常有用。The latter is also useful when referring to fields in the postcondition of a structure constructor.
